attributes.action: Make metal straws instead of plastic or paper.
attributes.additional_details: Please sign this petition as me and my friends believe this will make a huge difference in enviromental problems and will help a lot.
attributes.background: All I have heard recently is people complaining about the taste of the paper straws because they make the drink taste "funny". I think plastic and paper straws are just as bad as eachother. LETS CHANGE TO METAL STRAWS.

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for which straws people choose to use.

If you'd like the UK Government to take action to encourage people to use metal straws, you could start a new petition asking for that. 

You'll need to give your full name to start a petition.
